00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---

00005 // Revision:    2012-07-31 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <stdint.h>
00010 #include <iterator>
00011 #include "lsf/basic/macro.hpp"
00012 #include "lsf/basic/noncopyable.hpp"
00013 #include "lsf/basic/error.hpp"
00014 #include "lsf/basic/empty_type.hpp"
00015 
00016 namespace lsf {
00017 namespace container {
00018 namespace detail {
00019 
00020 // for container which do not need iterator
00021 class EmptyIterator {};
00022 
00024 // BasicBasicContainer
00026 template <typename ElemType, typename SizeType, typename StoreType, typename StateType,
00027           typename IteratorType = EmptyIterator>
00028 class BasicContainer : public lsf::basic::Error, public lsf::basic::NonCopyable {
00029 public:
00030     using value_type = ElemType;
00031     using size_type = SizeType;
00032     using iterator = IteratorType;
00033     using state_type = StateType;
00034     using reverse_iterator = std::reverse_iterator<iterator>;
00035 
00036 public:
00037     // bind and recover storage
00038     bool BindAndRecoverStorage(StoreType store) {
00039         _ptr_state = nullptr;
00040         _store = store;
00041 
00042         if (_store.GetPtr() == nullptr) {
00043             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + _store.ErrString());
00044             return false;
00045         }
00046 
00047         if (((StateType *)_store.GetPtr())->ElemByteSize() != sizeof(value_type)) {
00048             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO);
00049             return false;
00050         }
00051 
00052         _ptr_state = (StateType *)_store.GetPtr();
00053         return true;
00054     }
00055 
00056     // bind and initiate storage
00057     bool BindAndInitStorage(StoreType store) {
00058         _ptr_state = nullptr;
00059         _store = store;
00060 
00061         if (_store.GetPtr() == nullptr) {
00062             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + _store.ErrString());
00063             return false;
00064         }
00065 
00066         _ptr_state = (StateType *)_store.GetPtr();
00067         _ptr_state->Init(_store.GetSize());
00068         return true;
00069     }
00070 
00071     // accessor funcs
00072     size_type size() const { return _ptr_state->size(); }
00073     size_type max_size() const { return _ptr_state->max_size(); }
00074     size_t ElemByteSize() const { return _ptr_state->ElemByteSize(); }
00075 
00076     bool full() const { return _ptr_state->full(); }
00077     bool empty() const { return _ptr_state->empty(); }
00078     bool IsBindStorage() const { return _ptr_state != nullptr; }
00079 
00080     // static funcs
00081     static size_t CalcByteSize(size_type size) { return StateType::CalcByteSize(size); }
00082     static size_t CalcElemByteSize(StoreType store) { return StateType::CalcElemByteSize(store.GetPtr()); }
00083     static size_t CalcElemMaxSize(StoreType store) { return StateType::CalcElemMaxSize(store.GetPtr()); }
00084 
00085 protected:
00086     StateType *_ptr_state = nullptr;
00087     StoreType _store;
00088 };
00089 
00090 }  // end of namespace detail
00091 }  // end of namespace container
00092 }  // end of namespace lsf
00093
